name: Korean Fried Chicken
description: Double-frying chicken wings is the secret to achieving the delicate, crackly crust that is the hallmark of this popular Korean specialty
user_story: OMG MY FUCKING FAVORITE NOM NOM NOM
ingredients: 16 Chicken wings, Canola oil, 5 Cloves garlic, Soy sauce, Gochujang, Rice vinegar, Asian sesame oil, Honey

name: Shanghai Dumpling
description: Xialongbao is a type of steamed bun (baozi) from the Jiangnan region of China, especially associated with Shanghai and Wuxi. It is traditionally prepared in xiaolong, small bamboo steaming baskets, which give them their name.
ingredients: Chicken backs or wings, 6 Scallions, Kosher salt, 1/3 Pound ground pork

name: Lamb Tandoori
description: A spicy, yogurt-based marinade tenderizes the lamb, which is accompanied by a sweet and gingery chutney.
